Since 'winner takes all' capitalism was introduced by Ronald Regan there has been an inevitable drift towards oligarchy. The 1% keep getting richer. First generation Entrepreneurial wealth is morphing into dynastic wealth. Soon it will not be possible to distinguish economically between Russian oligarchy and American oligarchy. I delete two oligarchies will have more in common with each other than with 99% of their fellow countrymen.

The scrap yards should be charged with receiving stolen property. IF the laws were ENFORCED, this wouldn't be in the news. As far as the scrap yards not knowing these are stolen...come on,how many spares do you carry around in your car or truck?

Hera- You're the Queen of the Gods and the Goddess of marriage, women and birth. You are known to be temperamental but only to those who are unfaithful to you. They will get what they deserve, your revenge knows no limits! When you are not plotting against a traitor, you cherish and value the miracle of life, childbirth and hold onto your vows, who are extremely sacred to you. You are after all.. a Queen!
I once literally passed my friend on the finish line in Mario Kart. We were both sure she'd won until the #1 was on my half of the screen. It was sweet. #AmazonLeagueSweepstakes.

Maxine Mcfarlane He could save her. He has a magnificent plan that you and I are not privy to this side of heaven. He may want her to be in heaven with Him now to save her the pain of something even more awful and painful later. I do not know, but I trust my God with my whole heart! I, Maxine, can say this with certainty. MY SON died suddenly in Dec. and I know there was a reason he was allowed to go. You see, I believe in the Bible. I believe God when he said our days were numbered before we were formed in our mothers' womb. You see God is omnipotent, omniscient and always has been. In His kind and generous love he gave us our last nine months with our grown son (even moving us from another state, finding a buyer for our farm and letting us live WITH him for 3 months while we found the right house). We were so Blessed to have this wonderful person in our life and now I know he is not suffering any of life's burdens. I do not know about this 14 year old girl. I do not know if her decision is the right one. That is between her and God. BUT I do know that God could save her! I know that if it is in HIS plan He will. But I also know He will not leave her. He has not abandoned her. He never has and never will. Amen.
That perverted SOB

I celebrate this time of year for the same reason your church decided to back in around 350 CE ...the winter solstice; a solar event which has been celebrated since the dawn of mankind, many tens and possibly hundreds of thousands of years before the papyrus scribblings of some fearful desert dwellers... It really doesn't matter how un-Christlike you people act by trying to exclude the secular world from the joy and fellowship of the season...because: history. Happy holidays, I hope you have a nice Christmas. I'm pretty sure your Jesus would want EVERYONE to enjoy the season...even us heathens. Sorry you don't like the idea of sharing something that your religion stole in the first place.
Perhaps I misjudge you. You have a jewish name but perhaps you are just another troll.
